<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t InputOffset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store the data of the CIEs defined in this object, keyed by their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;uint64&#95;t, StringRef&gt;</a> LocalCIES;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.isValidOffset(InputOffset)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t InitialLength = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.getU32(&amp;InputOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InitialLength == 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a CIE, store it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> CIEData = OrigFrameData.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(EntryOffset, InitialLength + 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LocalCIES&#91;EntryOffset&#93; = CIEData;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The -4 is to account for the CIEId we just read.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InputOffset += InitialLength - 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some compilers seem to emit frame info that doesn&#39;t start at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the function entry point, thus we can&#39;t just lookup the address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the debug map. Use the AddressInfo&#39;s range map to see if the FDE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// describes something that we can relocate.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sum = <a href="/docs/api/classes/input">Input</a> + Output;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sum == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Difference / (Sum / 2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"></CodeLine>
